1,2,3,4:
n+smothered in XX
覆盖了XX的东西

Meat smothered in thick sauce.

2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9:
a word when you get a moment, please
等你有一点空闲的时候, 我想跟你说一句话

6,7,8,9:
all over this thing
在这上边到处都是
over表示在...上边
这里不用on

This has your fingerprints all over it(这个东西有你的指纹上边到处都是, 这里指纹并不是实指, 而是指这事情一看就是你干的)

He spilled red wine all over my shirt

3,4,5,6:
maintain my youthful figure

youth=n 年轻人
youthful=adj 年轻的

figure在这里和shape是一样的意思, 表示体型

maintain=v 保持

5,6,7,8:
Have you any idea how hard I work
注意从句中的语序, 如果你看不清, 请把复合句改为两个单独句来看

Have you any idea?

how hard do you work?疑问句语序, 做从句时需要改为陈述句的语序how hard you work.

后边的how much work I have to do 也是同样道理
10,11,12:
stay in shape
留在形状里, 哪个形状里? 就是比较瘦, 比较美的这个体型里.

Women like to stay in shape
I run every morning to stay in shape.
1,2,3:
have you any idea+how引起的句子
你对于XX有任何了解吗?
这里的idea不是指想法, 而是指了解的信息

Have you any idea how much I love my job?
Have you any idea how hard I practice every day?

3,4:
cannot live on sth alone
不能仅仅借助XX存活

I live on government's allowance.
我靠政府的补贴而存活

They seem to live on nothing but chips and chocolate.
